casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Stephen McCullough (9439)

Dupont, C. J., Norcott and Lavery, Js.

Argued June 11 decision released July 16, 1991 Stephen McCullough, pro se, the appellant (defendant). Margaret Gaffney Radionovas, deputy assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were John Bailey, state’s attorney, and Antonia Caratillo, deputy assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
